reason: Fed Policy Shock: HAWKISH_PIVOT - FOMC minutes released Feb 18 revealed a surprise hawkish shift, with several officials discussing potential interest rate hikes if inflation remains elevated—a sharp departure from the 2025 easing cycle. This was compounded by Feb 20 data showing core PCE inflation rose to a hotter-than-expected 3.0%.

payload.summary: FOMC minutes released Feb 18 revealed a surprise hawkish shift, with several officials discussing potential interest rate hikes if inflation remains elevated—a sharp departure from the 2025 easing cycle. This was compounded by Feb 20 data showing core PCE inflation rose to a hotter-than-expected 3.0%.
payload.market_impact: Strong bullish momentum for the US Dollar (USD); significant downward pressure on commodities, particularly Gold and Silver, as Treasury yields climb on the threat of resumed tightening.
